arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS: How did Carlisle United fare at Chesterfield?
arts.sum: RATINGS: Carlisle United lost 2-1 at Chesterfield – so how did we score the players at the SMH Group Stadium?

arts.ttl: Embleton sees red as ten-man Carlisle United lose at Chesterfield
arts.sum: REPORT: Ten-man Carlisle United were eventually beaten 2-1 by dominant Chesterfield after Elliot Embleton's red card.

arts.ttl: Chesterfield seal win as first-half dismissal costs Carlisle
Chesterfield expect a scrap from 'big-budget' Carlisle United
arts.sum: Play-off chasing Chesterfield expect “big-budget” Carlisle United to be scrapping for their lives in tonight's clash.

arts.ttl: Carlisle United 'poised for greatness' says owner in accounts
arts.sum: Relegation-bound Carlisle United are “poised for greatness” and can be a “regional powerhouse” according to owner Tom Piatak in the club's accounts.

arts.ttl: Carlisle United accounts reveal growth and cost of first Piatak season
arts.sum: Carlisle United’s accounts for the first season under the Piatak family reveal how income grew and spending also surged as the Blues fell to relegation.

arts.ttl: Carlisle United 'may need another £4m from owners next season'
arts.sum: Carlisle United may need up to £4m of further funding from their American owners next season, the club's latest accounts predict.

Chesterfield's 1-0 win over Barrow at the weekend was their fifth game without defeat and they have now won four of their last five. Carlisle's chances of survival were dealt a blow at the weekend fo...

arts.ttl: In pictures: Carlisle United fans at the Doncaster game
arts.sum: GALLERY: A 1,017-strong travelling support backed Carlisle United at Doncaster Rovers in Saturday's 3-0 defeat...

arts.ttl: 'Gutless and spineless' - Carlisle United fans on Doncaster defeat
arts.sum: Carlisle United fans gave us their views on X after the 3-0 defeat to Doncaster Rovers - read a selection of their comments here.
